lyric.verse: Houkago no koutei hi kanzakura Shiroi hiza kasa buta no ryouashi Hana no oku tsukinukeru fuyu no yume Sono saki ni aru mono wo osoreteta
lyric.chorus: Kogane no mori to Uuji no neiro Watashi no hoho wa Doushite anna ni Kogoeteita no darou
lyric.verse: Kurete yuku mainichi mo tomerarezu Kowai no wa furande yuku chibusa Mune wo kakinarasu sunabokori Tabun subete wa karamatta Kaze ni osarete hashitteta
lyric.chorus: Yuugao saita umi made no michi Watashi no mimi wa Doushite an'na ni Kogoeteita no darou Kogane no mori to uuji no neiro Watashi no hoho wa Doushite anna ni Kogoeteita no darou Doushite anna ni kogoeteita no darou Nadaraka ni meguri kobore ochiru deigo no namida

translator.translatorname: Kazu 'Omi' Kajihara, Marcelluss D. Nealy, Goshi Manabe

lyric.verse: School yards after school, cherry trees White knees, both legs with scabs Winter dreams sticking inside the nose I was frightened by what was ahead
lyric.chorus: Golden woods and the sound of the sugar grass I wondered why my cheeks were chilled that much
lyric.verse: I couldn't stop the days from going What scared me was my growing breast Sandy dust strumming my heart Maybe everything was tangling each other Running and pushed by the wind
lyric.chorus: The way to the sea with flower blossoms I wonder why my ears were chilled that much Golden woods and the sound of the sugar grass I wonder why my ears were chilled that much Why was I chilled that much Deigo's tears flowing up and gently falling
